title: These are the mountain bikes launching now with RockShox Flight Attendant!
content:
RockShox Flight Attendant makes sure your forks & shocks are always set perfectly setting, and these are the new mountain bikes launching now with wireless, automatic MTB suspension control! Get AXS enabled sensors on fork, shock & crankset to send data to the Flight Attendant controller for automatic, electronically adjusted suspension on-the-fly. Pick from Flight

The post These are the mountain bikes launching now with RockShox Flight Attendant! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
